listData.name: Equipment Finance
listData.description: We offer a range of lending options for investing in new equipment for your medical, dental or veterinary practice. We have helped thousands of practice owners find the best finance solution for their individual situation, and because we only deal with doctors, dentists and vets we truly understand the equipment finance needs of these industries. The equipment you choose for your practice is one of the most crucial decisions you will make. Thanks to our experience and strong partnership with the medical community, our trusted asset finance arrangements allow you to make better use of your cash flow.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible terms and repayment options

Earn reward points on your equipment purchases with a BOQ Specialist credit card. Clients can opt to purchase equipment via their BOQ Specialist credit card to earn reward points on the cost of the equipment as well as on the repayments. A 1.5% processing fee applies.

Like all major commercial lenders, BOQ Specialist offers four product options when it comes to financing medical equipment: lease, chattel mortgage, hire purchase or rental. Each has different tax benefits. Our finance specialists can talk you through these option in more detail and ensure you end up with the most effective choice for your practice.
Borrow from as little as $2 000

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical, dental, veterinary and accounting professionals

fees.name: Application Reassessment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when an application is reassessed

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $150 (PPSR security) $250 (property) Charged each time a security is discharged (per security)

fees.name: Break Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if an agreement is terminated before expiration of the term of that agreement

fees.name: Direct Debit Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each time a direct debit is received from you

fees.name: Consent to lease Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a consent to registration of lease and production of Certificate of Title is required

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if sending payment via Bank Cheque (per bank cheque)

fees.additionalInfo: $450 plus any applicable External Costs

fees.additionalInfo: $395 - $950. Charged for any variations made to the loan that need documentation

We have helped thousands of practice owners find the best finance solution for their individual situation, and because we only deal with doctors, dentists and vets we truly understand the equipment finance needs of these industries. The equipment you choose for your practice is one of the most crucial decisions you will make. Thanks to our experience and strong partnership with the medical community, our trusted asset finance arrangements allow you to make better use of your cash flow.

listData.name: Commercial Property Loan
listData.description: Own your practice premises with our commercial property loan and borrow up to 100% of the purchase price (subject to credit approval). At BOQ Specialist, we want to make buying your own practice premises as easy as possible. That's why our commercial property loans allow you to borrow up to 100% of the purchase price of your practice premises, with no Lender's Mortgage Insurance.

features.additionalInfo: Make repayments with your BOQ Specialist credit card and earn reward points. (T&Cs apply)
Borrow up to 100% of the purchase price to buy your own practice premises or up to 80% of the purchase price for a commercial investment
Lending via SMSF have different borrowing criteria. Borrow up to 90% of the purchase price for owner-occupied practice premise
Competitive commercial property loan interest rates
No Lender's Mortgage Insurance
Fixed, variable and line of credit options to choose from
Flexible loan structures including interest-only for certain periods
Stand-alone financing linked to the property being financed
Construction loans for purpose-built practice premises (not in SMSF)

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical, dental, veterinary and accounting professionals

detailData.name: Commercial Property Loan
detailData.description: Own your practice premises with our commercial property loan and borrow up to 100% of the purchase price (subject to credit approval). At BOQ Specialist, we want to make buying your own practice premises as easy as possible. That's why our commercial property loans allow you to borrow up to 100% of the purchase price of your practice premises, with no Lender's Mortgage Insurance.

listData.name: Goodwill (Practice Purchase Loan)
listData.description: Do you dream of owning your own private practice? Or a share of an existing practice? Our extensive experience in lending to doctors, dentists and vets means that we understand the value of your profession and are able to lend against the practice's goodwill and equipment, rather than your home. We can lend up to 100% of the amount you need to buy an existing practice without requiring you to use your home or other property as security. We can also lend up to 100% of the amount you need to buy into an existing partnership or increase your share in a practice. Existing partners can remain unaffected as we only take security interest over your share of the partnership.

features.additionalInfo: Access to a range of products to help you with other costs related to practice purchases, such as legal fees, conveyancing and stamp duty
Choose a flexible loan structure and repayment terms to suit your cash flow needs
Benefit from our competitive fixed and variable rate options
Secure against goodwill and equipment, rather than against your home or other property
Redraw on your existing goodwill equity and tangible assets for personal or business related needs
Borrow up to 100% of the purchase price of an existing practice, or a share in a partnership (subject to credit approval)

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical, dental, veterinary and accounting professionals

listData.name: Term Deposit
listData.description: Looking for a dependable yield from your income or hard earned savings? Then a BOQ Specialist fixed term deposit could be an option to consider

features.additionalInfo: 24/7 service with our Client Service Centre
Flexible terms ranging from 30 days to 5 years
Flexibility to re-invest, add extra money or withdraw at the end of the term
Consistently competitive ongoing term deposit interest rates on new funds and rollovers
No establishment or account keeping fees
Manage your own term deposit prior to maturity via online banking

constraints.additionalInfo: While we have the discretion to determine deposit size, we usually accept a minimum deposit of  AUD 10,000.00

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical professionals and accountants

listData.name: 32 Day Notice Account
listData.description: If you need more frequent access to your savings, our notice account features a competitive interest rate, that is calculated on the daily closing credit balance of your account and paid monthly, and gives you access to your money after providing 32 days’ notice. A good choice for you if you are saving for a goal such as a deposit on a house, new car or holiday, you would like to make regular deposits to your savings, and if you prefer a variable interest rate.

features.additionalInfo: A savings account with funds available with 32 days prior notice
Competitive interest rate on credit balances and no monthly account keeping fees
Add funds to account at any time
Interest calculated daily and paid monthly
No minimum balance requirements
Easily access your funds using your Visa debit card, via online banking and our mobile app including BPAY and Pay Anyone functionality

constraints.additionalInfo: While we have the discretion to determine deposit size, we usually accept a minimum deposit of  AUD 10,000.00

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is offered to medical, dental, veterinary & accounting professionals only

detailData.name: Private Access Account
detailData.description: The BOQ Specialist Private Access account allows you to make deposits and transfer funds at any time, requires no ongoing minimum balance and pays a competitive variable rate of interest on your entire balance. A good choice for you if you want daily access to your funds and you prefer a variable interest rate.

listData.name: Overdrafts
listData.description: The overdraft facility is an optional feature of the BOQ Specialist One account. The facility can help you to manage your cash flow, particularly when paying for practice expenses. It can give you an unsecured line of credit and you don't have to use your personal property as security. You only pay interest on what you use, not on the entire credit limit.

features.additionalInfo: Optional overdraft with a secured or unsecured line of credit.
Integration with accounting software such as MYOB, Xero and Banklink, allowing you to easily manage your practice cash flow.
Only pay interest on what you use, not the entire amount. No set repayments, you only pay interest on the funds you have used, there are no charges on any credit you don't use
Interest Only payments with terms up to 30 years

Access to additional money to use as and when you need it. Additional funds can be accessed like you normally would - by withdrawing cash at ATMs and making purchases using your BOQ Specialist debit card. You can also continue to transfer from your account through internet banking and the BOQ Specialist mobile banking app.
Earn a competitive rate of interest on account credit balances.
For a secured line of credit, you could access up to $100,000, and for an unsecured line of credit, you could access up to $500,000 without using your personal property as security.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical professionals and accountants

fees.name: Optional Overdraft Facility Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If your Overdraft is approved and established, the Application Fee will be debited from your Account

detailData.name: Overdrafts
detailData.description: The overdraft facility is an optional feature of the BOQ Specialist One account. The facility can help you to manage your cash flow, particularly when paying for practice expenses. It can give you an unsecured line of credit and you don't have to use your personal property as security. You only pay interest on what you use, not on the entire credit limit.

listData.name: Home Loan Banking Package
listData.description: More than just a home loan, the package allows you to manage your finances in one place with the help of a dedicated financial specialist. It combines a home loan with a credit card and an everyday bank account

features.additionalInfo: Choose between a variable or a fixed rate home loan
Up to 5 loans in the one package, to easily manage your finances in one location
Everyday banking with the One Account, featuring a favourable interest rate on credit balances in your account, and an optional overdraft should you need it
Borrow up to 90% LVR with no LMI
Individuals, Companies and Trusts
A Platinum credit card that comes with premium rewards and benefits
Optional offset transaction account with the variable rate home loan to reduce interest payments

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is offered to medical, dental ,veterinary & accounting professionals only

detailData.name: Home Loan Banking Package

listData.name: Car Loan
listData.description: Buying a car is all about a multitude of choices - colours, makes, models and optional extras. If a car gives you freedom of choice, why be limited to a car loan that doesn't offer the same? We offer a wide choice of tailored car loan solutions and go to great lengths to give the financing that's right for you.

features.additionalInfo: Can be structured for an individual, company or trust.
Available for new and used vehicles, dealer and private sale
Use your BOQ Specialist credit card to purchase your car or make loan repayments and earn reward points at the same time. A 1.5% processing fee applies.
Option to finance for business or private use
Flexible terms of up to five years
Competitive car loan interest rates.
Tailored loan repayments to suit your cash-flow needs, including fixed and variable options

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is offered to medical, dental ,veterinary & accounting professionals only

detailData.name: Car Loan
detailData.description: Buying a car is all about a multitude of choices - colours, makes, models and optional extras. If a car gives you freedom of choice, why be limited to a car loan that doesn't offer the same? We offer a wide choice of tailored car loan solutions and go to great lengths to give the financing that's right for you.

listData.name: Platinum Visa Credit Card
listData.description: At BOQ Specialist, we believe it's important to find the credit card that's right for you. Whether you are a doctor, dentist or vet, we have a credit card to match your personal and business needs. Everyone likes to be rewarded. That's why BOQ Specialist credit cards come with an exciting range of premium benefits. You'll find it's easier than expected to earn, enjoy and relax

features.additionalInfo: 0.5 Frequent Flyer Point for every $1 spent on eligible purchases in Australia up to 5 000 points per month and 0.25 points per $1 thereafter 1 Frequent Flyer Point for every $1 spent on eligible international purchases 1 Frequent Flyer Point for every $1 spent on eligible BOQ Specialist finance contracts
Redeem your rewards points for travel, entertainment or merchandise to suit your preference
You can use your credit card to make monthly repayments on select existing contracts or purchase larger assets to grow your rewards points faster
Client Service Centre - available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
Easy, fast and secure payments with Apple Pay
Manage your finances easily - our credit card is compatible with financial accounting systems such as XERO and MYOB
Split statements - need separate credit cards for business and personal purposes? No problem. We can offer multiple credit cards under one account and split your statements up to simplify life

features.additionalValue: Travel insurance and retail item cover
features.additionalInfo: Insurance cover, including domestic and international travel insurance for you, your spouse and legally dependant children, purchase security and extended warranty with your BOQ Specialist credit card

Visa Concierge Service - get a helping hand with travel recommendations and local event tickets Visa Front Line Access - reserve tickets to some of the best shows, concerts and sporting events. Visa Entertainment - get the hottest entertainment offers including pre-sale tickets and member promotions
Easily access your funds using your Visa debit card, via online banking and our mobile app including BPAY and Pay Anyone functionality
Easy, fast and secure payments with Google Pay
Earn Qantas rewards points on your everyday purchases

eligibility.additionalInfo: Students exempt from minimum income requirement
Product is generally offered to medical, dental, veterinary or accounting professions and their associates and suppliers

fees.name: Foreign Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you make a transaction on your card account in a currency other than Australian dollars, or you make a transaction on your card account in any currency (including AUD) that is processed by the card scheme or billed by the merchant outside Australia. 1.0% of the total amount of each such transaction is payable to Visa as a currency conversion charge and the remaining 2.2% of the total amount of each such transaction is an administration fee payable to BOQ Specialist.

fees.name: Annual Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Deducted from your card account after you activate your card account and then on each anniversary after that date (unless otherwise advertised)

fees.name: Payment Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable per dishonour and deducted from your card account at the time of dishonour.

fees.name: Voucher Retrieval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each voucher retrieval you request BOQ Specialist to obtain from a relevant merchant.

fees.name: Duplicate and Interim Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per request (payable and deducted from your card account on request of a statement or copy of a statement in addition to the monthly credit card statement we give you in accordance with the Conditions of Use).

listData.name: EverydayPlus Account
listData.description: Introducing the BOQ Specialist Everyday Plus account. The only everyday account that allows you to earn Qantas reward points. There are no establishment or account keeping fees and you can redeem your Qantas Points for flights, holidays and more. It's an everyday account that's more rewarding. When you become a BOQ Specialist client, you will be matched with a dedicated financial specialist who can assist with all of your personal and business banking needs. You will also benefit from onshore support with our Client Service Centre 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

features.additionalInfo: Free ATM withdrawals at over 2,100 atmx by Armaguard ATMs, as well as all BOQ branch ATMs and the four major banks Australia wide
Easily access your funds using your Visa debit card, via online banking and our mobile app including BPAY and Pay Anyone functionality
Earn 1 Frequent Flyer Point for every $20 of daily average balance in your account, calculated at the end of each month and paid on balances up to $100 000
No establishment or account keeping fees
Easily access your funds using your Visa debit card
Easy, fast and secure payments with Google Pay
Easy, fast and secure payments with Apple Pay
Easily access your funds using your Visa debit card, via online banking and our mobile app including BPAY and Pay Anyone functionality

When you become a BOQ Specialist client, you will be matched with a dedicated financial specialist who can assist with all of your personal and business banking needs. You will also benefit from onshore support with our Client Service Centre 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is offered to medical, dental, veterinary & accounting professionals only

fees.name: Foreign Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you make a transaction on your card account in a currency other than Australian dollars, or you make a transaction on your card account in any currency (including AUD) that is processed by the card scheme or billed by the merchant outside Australia. 1.0% of the total amount of each such transaction is payable to Visa as a currency conversion charge and the remaining 1.95% of the total amount of each such transaction is an administration fee payable to BOQ Specialist.

fees.name: Foreign ATM Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each transaction at an ATM outside of Australia.

fees.name: Voucher Retrieval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each voucher retrieval you request BOQ Specialist to obtain from a relevant merchant.

fees.name: Trace Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each request to perform a trace on any transaction type

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for issuing a bank cheque

fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each Bank Audit Certificate issued as part of an audit request

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if we honour a transaction that overdraws your account

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if there is insufficent cleared funds available to cover the value of a direct debit being processed

fees.name: GCAS emergency card replacement Fee

The bonus margin will apply to the One Account for credit balances until 1 July the year after the Eligible Graduate graduates

listData.name: Basic Home Loan
listData.description: The Basic Home Loan offers a low competitive interest rate, an optional One Account to support your everyday banking needs and a redraw facility to manage surplus funds.

features.additionalInfo: You can also benefit from an optional transactional account. Our One Account helps to manage your everyday banking, which features a favourable interest rate on credit balances in your account
Choose between a variable or a fixed rate home loan
Access to a redraw facility to help manage surplus funds (fees may apply)
24/7 service with our Client Service Centre
Borrow up to 90% LVR with no LMI

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is offered to medical, dental ,veterinary & accounting professionals only

fees.name: Monthly fee
fees.additionalInfo: Waived when a transactional account is opened and used as the primary account debited for repayment.

detailData.name: Basic Home Loan
detailData.description: The Basic Home Loan offers a low competitive interest rate, an optional One Account to support your everyday banking needs and a redraw facility to manage surplus funds.

listData.name: Motor Vehicle Finance
listData.description: Buying a car is all about a multitude of choices - colours, makes, optional extras and models. If a car gives you freedom of choice, why be limited to a car loan that doesn't offer the same? At BOQ Specialist, we offer a wide choice of tailored motor vehicle financing solutions and go to great lengths to give the financing that's right for you. Not only can we offer competitive car finance interest rates, we can offer flexible repayment structures to suit your needs.

features.additionalInfo: Can be structured for an individual, company or trust
Fixed and variable terms of up to seven years
Loans can be structured with or without balloon payments
Car loan repayments to suit your cash-flow
Competitive car loan interest rates
Car finance available for both new and used vehicles
Option to finance for business or private use
Structured car loan options including car finance lease, hire purchase, chattel mortgages and novated lease

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical, dental, veterinary and accounting professionals

fees.additionalInfo: $450 plus any applicable External Costs

detailData.name: Motor Vehicle Finance
detailData.description: Buying a car is all about a multitude of choices - colours, makes, optional extras and models. If a car gives you freedom of choice, why be limited to a car loan that doesn't offer the same? At BOQ Specialist, we offer a wide choice of tailored motor vehicle financing solutions and go to great lengths to give the financing that's right for you. Not only can we offer competitive car finance interest rates, we can offer flexible repayment structures to suit your needs.

listData.name: Fit Out Finance
listData.description: You've rented or purchased premises for your practice and now you need to fit it out with fixtures and fittings to make it look professional. We know it's a complex task, with all sorts of hidden pitfalls and unforeseen costs that can be exacerbated by restrictions of the finance you've arranged. We make it easy with a flexible escrow facility which covers everything - and we mean everything, from dry walling right down to carpets, windows, paint and plumbing. We manage the payments to suppliers under your instruction and you pay the total amount back in one simple repayment structure. Fit-outs are a large investment in your practice and while it's important that you choose the right assets and equipment, it's equally important that you choose the right kind of financing.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible draw-down facility for payments during the fitout process
Manage payments across various suppliers/trades people
Flexible terms and repayment options including low startup repayments
A range of fitout finance options including lease, hire purchase, rental or chattel mortgage
Options of no repayments during the drawdown stage to free up cash flow
Your dedicated financial specialist can manage the facility and payments of invoices to free up your time

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical, dental, veterinary and accounting professionals

detailData.name: Fit Out Finance
detailData.description: You've rented or purchased premises for your practice and now you need to fit it out with fixtures and fittings to make it look professional. We know it's a complex task, with all sorts of hidden pitfalls and unforeseen costs that can be exacerbated by restrictions of the finance you've arranged. We make it easy with a flexible escrow facility which covers everything - and we mean everything, from dry walling right down to carpets, windows, paint and plumbing. We manage the payments to suppliers under your instruction and you pay the total amount back in one simple repayment structure. Fit-outs are a large investment in your practice and while it's important that you choose the right assets and equipment, it's equally important that you choose the right kind of financing.

listData.name: Construction Loan
listData.description: A construction loan is a facility with the flexibility to make progress payments to your builder throughout the construction period as each building stage is completed.

features.additionalInfo: While they're building, you only pay interest on the progress claims made.
Instead of lending you the whole amount upfront, we make a series of progress payments to your builder as they reach certain stages in the building process.
Do major renovations to a property you already own.
Build a new structure on land you already own.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical, dental, veterinary and accounting professionals.

fees.name: Consent to lease Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a consent to registration of lease and production of Certificate of Title is required.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for external property valuation costs where a property valuation is required.

fees.name: Quantity Surveyors Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for external services provided by a Quantity Surveyor on construction facilities where these services are deemed by Us as required.

fees.name: Settlement Cancellation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if a booked settlement does not proceed.

fees.name: Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged each time you request us to provide information about your facility, including preparing figures and retrieving documents (for example subpoenas and family law proceedings). $80 per hour per staff required to attend.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if sending payment via Bank Cheque (per bank cheque).

fees.name: Variation Fee (including increase, extension, substitution, novation)
fees.additionalInfo: $395 - $950. Charged for any variations made to the loan that need documentation.

fees.name: Credit Card Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when loan payment via BOQS credit card.

fees.name: Construction fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on expiry date which is the day on which the final repayment is due under the repayment schedule. 1.10% of the total amount of the principal outstanding (where the total amount of escrow finance is equal to or less than $200k). 0.80% of the total amount of the principal outstanding (where the total amount of escrow finance is greater than $200k and equal to or less than $500k). 0.50% of the total amount of the principal outstanding (where the total amount of escrow finance is greater than $500k).

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for additional valuation required by us.

fees.name: Legal Fee (including settlement and agent fees)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when solicitors need to be involved with matters relating to the documentation and settlement of loans.

fees.name: Application Reassessment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when an application is reassessed.

fees.name: Trust Deed Review
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a trust deed requires review.

fees.name: Government Stamp Duty
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if a NSW deal and stamp duty applies.

fees.name: Special Attendance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you require any special attendance (for example, the production of the title for any reason, consent to a subsequent mortgage, variation or substitution of security). $450 plus any applicable External Costs.

fees.name: Documentation or Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for set up of the Facility.

fees.name: Termination Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if an agreement is terminated before expiration of the term of that agreement.

fees.name: Substitution/Assignment/Novation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $450 plus any applicable External Costs.

fees.name: Monthly Account Keeping Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged monthly in arrears (with the first payment due one month after the day the advance or the first part of it is drawn to or to the order of the Customer) for the provision and maintenance of the facility.

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $150 (PPSR security), $250 (property). Charged each time a security is discharged (per security).

fees.name: SWIFT Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if sending payment via SWIFT.

fees.name: Arrears Management and Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for the management of any contract in arrears. $140 per hour per staff required to attend.

fees.name: Payment Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged each time a cheque or payment made by you is dishonoured.
